newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ ADRs weaker as Dow dives 106 points in late N.Y.
newsitem.headline: NZ ADRs weaker as Dow dives 106 points in late N.Y.

text.p: New Zealand ADRs were mostly weaker in late New York trade, where the Dow Industrials were 106.98 points lower at 6,932.39 at 7.50 a.m. NZT.
Price movements of NZ stocks listed in the U.S., Britain and Australia.

Notes - In New York, Telecom's American Depository Receipts are traded in bundles of 16 shares, while both the Fletcher Challenge shares are in bundles of 10 each. Tranz Rail ADSs are groups of three ordinary shares.
- Asterisk * means stock is still trading
